statements: SELECT * FROM support_reports ORDER BY ticket_date DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, agent_id, customer_id, ticket_date, ticket_status FROM support_reports WHERE agent_performance_rating > 4;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id, customer_feedback FROM support_reports WHERE ticket_status = 'Open';
SELECT ticket_id, agent_id, customer_id, ticket_date FROM support_reports WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT ticket_id, agent_id, agent_performance_rating FROM support_reports WHERE agent_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM support_reports WHERE ticket_status = 'Open';
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_date, agent_performance_rating FROM support_reports WHERE agent_id = '1234';
SELECT customer_id, ticket_id, customer_feedback FROM support_reports WHERE agent_performance_rating >= 4;
SELECT agent_id, customer_id, ticket_date, customer_feedback FROM support_reports WHERE ticket_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT agent_id, ticket_status FROM support_reports WHERE ticket_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM support_tickets WHERE status = 'open';
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id, agent_id FROM support_tickets WHERE agent_id = 5;
SELECT agent_name, total_tickets_handled, satisfaction_rating FROM agent_performance WHERE satisfaction_rating > 4;
SELECT issue_description, status FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM agent_performance ORDER BY total_tickets_handled DESC;
SELECT * FROM support_tickets WHERE status='Open';
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id, agent_id FROM support_tickets WHERE agent_id=101 AND status='Closed';
SELECT agent_name, total_tickets_handled FROM agent_performance ORDER BY total_tickets_handled DESC;
SELECT * FROM support_tickets WHERE status='Resolved' AND issue_description LIKE '%urgent%';
SELECT agent_id, agent_name, satisfaction_rating FROM agent_performance WHERE satisfaction_rating >= 4 ORDER BY satisfaction_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM support_ticket_trends WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT ticket_number, opened_at FROM support_ticket_trends WHERE id = 1;
SELECT department, AVG(performance_score) AS average_score FROM agent_performance GROUP BY department;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT agent_name, department, performance_score FROM agent_performance ORDER BY performance_score DESC, agent_name ASC;
SELECT id, ticket_number, status, opened_at FROM support_ticket_trends WHERE status='Open' ORDER BY opened_at DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT agent_name, department, performance_score FROM agent_performance WHERE department='Sales' ORDER BY performance_score DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating, customer_name ASC LIMIT 8
SELECT id, ticket_number, status, opened_at FROM support_ticket_trends WHERE status='Closed' AND opened_at BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY ticket_number ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT agent_name, department, AVG(performance_score) AS avg_score FROM agent_performance GROUP BY department HAVING avg_score > 80 ORDER BY department
SELECT * FROM support_tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id, agent_id, status, creation_date, resolution_date FROM support_tickets ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id, agent_id FROM support_tickets WHERE status='Open' AND agent_id=101;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_tickets FROM support_tickets GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_tickets DESC;
SELECT agent_name, performance_rating, total_tickets_handled FROM agent_performance WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM support_tickets WHERE status='Resolved';
SELECT ticket_id, agent_id, status FROM support_tickets WHERE creation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT agent_name, team_id, performance_rating FROM agent_performance ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT agent_name, total_tickets_handled FROM agent_performance WHERE total_tickets_handled > 100 ORDER BY total_tickets_handled DESC;
SELECT report_type, report_date, accuracy_rating, improvement_suggestions FROM service_effectiveness WHERE accuracy_rating < 4 AND report_date >= '2022-05-01';
SELECT * FROM support_tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_status, ticket_created_at FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Open';
SELECT agent_id, total_tickets_handled FROM agent_performance ORDER BY total_tickets_handled DESC;
SELECT feedback_rating, feedback_comment FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_rating > 4;
SELECT report_type, generated_by_agent_id, generated_date FROM report_generation ORDER BY generated_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM support_tickets ORDER BY ticket_created_at DESC;
SELECT agent_id, total_tickets_handled FROM agent_performance WHERE agent_rating > 4.5;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_rating, feedback_comment FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM report_generation WHERE report_type = 'Weekly' AND generated_date >= '2021-09-01';
SELECT report_id, customer_satisfaction_rating, service_improvement_suggestions FROM service_effectiveness ORDER BY customer_satisfaction_rating DESC;
